alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Jackson; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Woodruff, southwestern Jackson, southeastern Cleburne and central White Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Steprock, or 8 miles northeast of Searcy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Augusta... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Pangburn... Russell... Crosby... Steprock... Bradford... Letona... Albion... Clay... Providence... Dewey... Heffington... Possum Grape... Worden... Pickens in White County... Velvet Ridge... Plainview in White County... This includes US Highway 67 between mile markers 48 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
